function.arguments:
{"command":"create","path":"/workspace/test_runner.sh","file_text":"#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Define tests: pairs of input and expected output (without trailing newline)
inputs=(
"3
takahashi 2
aoki 6
snuke 5
"
"1
abc 100
"
"3
a 1
ab 2
aba 3
"
"4
zz 10
aa 20
mm 30
bb 40
"
"3
alpha 1
beta 2
gamma 3
"
"5
delta 1
echo 2
bravo 3
charlie 4
foxtrot 5
"
)

expected=(
"snuke"
"abc"
"aba"
"zz"
"alpha"
"echo"
)

fail=0

for i in "${!inputs[@]}"; do
    inp="${inputs[$i]}"
    exp="${expected[$i]}"

    # Read N
    N=$(printf "%s" "$inp" | sed -n '1p')

    # Read the following N lines and collect names and ratings
    total=0
    names=()
    while IFS= read -r name rating; do
        # skip empty lines
        if [ -z "$name" ]; then
            continue
        fi
        names+=("$name")
        total=$((total + rating))
    done < <(printf "%s" "$inp" | sed -n '2,$p')

    # Sort names lexicographically
    IFS=$'\n' sorted=( $(printf "%s\n" "${names[@]}" | sort) )
    unset IFS

    idx=$(( total % N ))
    winner="${sorted[$idx]}"

    if [ "$winner" != "$exp" ]; then
        echo "Test $((i+1)) failed"
        echo "Input:"; printf "%s\n" "$inp"
        echo "Expected: $exp"
        echo "Got: $winner"
        fail=1
    fi
done

if [ "$fail" -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "All tests passed"
    exit 0
else
    exit 1
fi
","security_risk":"LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

args.file_text:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Define tests: pairs of input and expected output (without trailing newline)
inputs=(
"3
takahashi 2
aoki 6
snuke 5
"
"1
abc 100
"
"3
a 1
ab 2
aba 3
"
"4
zz 10
aa 20
mm 30
bb 40
"
"3
alpha 1
beta 2
gamma 3
"
"5
delta 1
echo 2
bravo 3
charlie 4
foxtrot 5
"
)

expected=(
"snuke"
"abc"
"aba"
"zz"
"alpha"
"echo"
)

fail=0

for i in "${!inputs[@]}"; do
    inp="${inputs[$i]}"
    exp="${expected[$i]}"

    # Read N
    N=$(printf "%s" "$inp" | sed -n '1p')

    # Read the following N lines and collect names and ratings
    total=0
    names=()
    while IFS= read -r name rating; do
        # skip empty lines
        if [ -z "$name" ]; then
            continue
        fi
        names+=("$name")
        total=$((total + rating))
    done < <(printf "%s" "$inp" | sed -n '2,$p')

    # Sort names lexicographically
    IFS=$'\n' sorted=( $(printf "%s\n" "${names[@]}" | sort) )
    unset IFS

    idx=$(( total % N ))
    winner="${sorted[$idx]}"

    if [ "$winner" != "$exp" ]; then
        echo "Test $((i+1)) failed"
        echo "Input:"; printf "%s\n" "$inp"
        echo "Expected: $exp"
        echo "Got: $winner"
        fail=1
    fi
done

if [ "$fail" -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "All tests passed"
    exit 0
else
    exit 1
fi
